## Summary
- [ ] Scope and intent documented
- [ ] Risk level explained
- [ ] Rollback plan described

## Testing
- [ ] Attached CloudFormation launch URL or CLI transcript when infrastructure changes
- [ ] Provided smoke-test command or steps for reviewers

## Checklist
- [ ] Conventional Commit used
- [ ] Updated docs (`README`, `AGENTS.md`, or onboarding) if behavior changed
- [ ] Synced OpenAPI schema (`assumerole_portal/api/schema.py`) with API changes
- [ ] Security review (credentials, secrets, IAM policies) completed
